body: query {transactionlistbycustomer (customer:"24f7c851-29d4-4af9-87c5-0298fa74c689"){ transactions { id, alias, amount, created_at, updated_at, merchant_provider { id, name, processor { name }, processing { monthly_cap, discount_rate, transaction_fee, reserve_rate, maximum_chargeback_ratio, transaction_counts { daily, weekly, monthly } }, enabled, gateway { ... on NMI { name, username, password, processor_id } ... on Innovio { name, username, password, product_id } ... on Stripe {name, api_key} }, allow_prepaid, accepted_payment_methods, customer_service { email, url, description, phone }, created_at, updated_at }, rebill { id, bill_at, amount, parentsession { id, customer { id, firstname, lastname, address { line1, line2, city, state, zip } } }, product_schedules { id, schedule { price, start, end, period, product { id } } } }, processor_response, products { amount, product { id, name, sku, ship, shipping_delay, fulfillment_provider { id, name, provider { name } } }, shippingreceipt { id, created_at, updated_at, status, tracking { carrier, id } } } }, pagination { count, end_cursor, has_next_page } }, }
